Tickets booking API documentation version v1

Tickets api

Api for buying tickets for any events
We have the next types of entities:

  • event
  • ticket
  • user

Api provides possibility to manage events and tickets, but not users.

Description

All data is sent and recieved as JSON. Blank fields are included as null instead of being omitted. All timestamps are returned in ISO 8601 format:

YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

Specifying of timezone is not nessesary.

Summary representation

When you fetch a list of resources, the response includes a subset of the attributes for that resource. This is the "summary" representation of the resource. You can see such behaviour when get list of tickets of list of events. If you need more attribute got to detailed representation (every item contains link for it).

Detailed representation

When you fetch an individual resource, the response typically includes all attributes for that resource. This is the "detailed" representation of the resource.
The documentation provides an example response and their schemas for each API method. The example response illustrates all attributes that are returned by that method.

Parameters

Api methods for get list can recieve parameters for filter, pagination and sorting. More information you can get reading the docs.

Hypermedia

Many resources may have one or more url properties linking to other resources. F.e. summary items contains links to detailed, also parents and children have links to each other. These are meant to provide explicit URLs so that proper API clients don't need to construct URLs on their own. It is recommended that API clients use these. Doing so will make future upgrades of the API easier for developers.

Pagination

All list requests provide pagination properties. Such as:

  • size - page size (default: 30)
  • offset - offset from begginnig (default: 0) You can use them as query parameters like ?offset=30&size=10

Sorting

List requests provide ability for sorting. You can sort by any of fields you can find in summary representation.

Filtering

List requests also provide ability for f. You can filter by any of fields you can find in summary representation.

/events

/events get post

get

Retrieve events list

post

Creates new event

get /events

Retrieve events list

  • Request
  • Response

Query Parameters

  • Sorting field: (one of name, date, ticketsAmount, freeTicketsAmount)

    Field to sort by

    Example:

    name
  • Sorting order: (one of asc, desc)

    Field to sort by

    Example:

    asc
  • Page size: (integer)

    Page size for pagination

    Example:

    10
  • Filter field: (string)

    Field to filter by connect. Used only with "value" parameter

    Example:

    name
  • Filter value: (string)

    Field to filter by connect. Used only with "value" parameter

    Example:

    Very interesting event

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "description": "Event list information",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "size": {
      "decription": "Size of current list",
      "type": "integer"  
    },
    "offset": {
      "description": "Offset, for pagination",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "sort": {
      "description": "Field name to sort",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["name", "date", "ticketsAmount", "freeTicketsAmount"]
    },
    "order": {
      "description": "Sort order",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["asc", "desc"]
    },
    "hits": {
      "decription": "Number of all hits",
      "type": "integer"
    },    
    "items": {
      "descriptions": "Events list",
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {        
          "id": {
            "description": "Event id",
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "url": {
            "description": "Link to event details",
            "type": "string"
          },
          "name": {
            "description": "Event name",
            "type": "string"  
          },
          "date": {
            "description": "Date if event",
            "type": "string",
            "format": "date-time"
          },
          "ticketsUrl": {
            "description": "Link to tickets",
            "type": "string"
          },
          "ticketsAmount": {
            "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
            "type": "integer",
            "minimum": 0
          },
          "freeTicketsAmount": {
            "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
            "type": "integer",
            "minimum": 0
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "hits": 4,
  "size": 2,
  "offset": 1,
  "sort": "name",
  "order": "desc",
  "items": [
    {
      "url": "/events/1",
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Very interesting event",
      "date": "2016-10-27T15:00:00+03:00",
      "ticketsUrl": "/event/1/tickets",
      "ticketsAmount": 123,
      "freeTicketsAmount": 101 
    },
    {
      "url": "/events/2",
      "id": 2,
      "name": "One more very interesting event",
      "date": "2016-12-21T19:00:00+03:00",
      "ticketsUrl": "/event/2/tickets",
      "ticketsAmount": 42,
      "freeTicketsAmount": 24 
    }
  ]
}

post /events

Creates new event

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event creation",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "required": ["name", "date"]
  }
}

HTTP status code 201

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {        
      "description": "Event id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "ticketsUrl": {
      "description": "Link to tickets",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "ticketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "freeTicketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "required": ["url", "id", "name", "date", "ticketsUrl", "ticketsAmount", "freeTicketsAmount"]
  }
}

Example:

{
  "url": "/events/1",
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Very interesting event",
  "date": "2016-10-27T15:00:00+03:00",
  "ticketsUrl": "/event/1/tickets",
  "ticketsAmount": 123,
  "freeTicketsAmount": 101 
}

HTTP status code 422

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Error description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "message": {
      "description": "Error message",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "erorrs": {
      "properties": {
        "field": {
          "description": "Field name",
          "type": "string"
        },
        "code": {
          "description": "Error code",
          "type": "string"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "required": ["message"]
}

/events/{eventId} get put

get

Retrieve scpecific event details

put

Update event properties

get /events/{eventId}

Retrieve scpecific event details

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • eventId: required (string)

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Event description",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {        
      "description": "Event id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "name": {
      "description": "Event name",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "date": {
      "description": "Date if event",
      "type": "string",
      "format": "date-time"
    },
    "ticketsUrl": {
      "description": "Link to tickets",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "ticketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "freeTicketsAmount": {
      "description": "Full tickets amount for event",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 0
    },
    "required": ["url", "id", "name", "date", "ticketsUrl", "ticketsAmount", "freeTicketsAmount"]
  }
}

Example:

{
  "url": "/events/1",
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Very interesting event",
  "date": "2016-10-27T15:00:00+03:00",
  "ticketsUrl": "/event/1/tickets",
  "ticketsAmount": 123,
  "freeTicketsAmount": 101 
}

/events/{eventId}/tickets get post

get

Retrieve a list of tickets for specified

post

Create tickets amount for event

get /events/{eventId}/tickets

Retrieve a list of tickets for specified

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • eventId: required (string)

Query Parameters

  • Sorting field: (one of name, date, ticketsAmount, freeTicketsAmount)

    Field to sort by

    Example:

    name
  • Sorting order: (one of asc, desc)

    Field to sort by

    Example:

    asc
  • Page size: (integer)

    Page size for pagination

    Example:

    10
  • Filter field: (string)

    Field to filter by connect. Used only with "value" parameter

    Example:

    price
  • Filter value: (string)

    Field to filter by connect. Used only with "value" parameter

    Example:

    150

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "description": "Tickets list information",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "size": {
      "decription": "Size of current list",
      "type": "integer"  
    },
    "offset": {
      "description": "Offset, for pagination",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "sort": {
      "description": "Field name to sort",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["price", "eventName"]
    },
    "order": {
      "description": "Sort order",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["asc", "desc"]
    },
    "hits": {
      "decription": "Number of all hits",
      "type": "integer"
    }, 
    "items": {
      "descriptions": "Tickets list",
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {        
          "id": {
            "description": "Ticket id",
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "url": {
            "description": "Link to ticket",
            "type": "string"
          },
          "details": {
            "description": "Any ticket details",
            "type": "string"  
          },
          "eventName": {
            "description": "Event name",
            "type": "string"  
          },
          "price": {
            "description": "Ticket price",
            "type": "number"  
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "hits": 3,
  "items": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "url": "tickets/1",
      "details": "Sector A",
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "url": "tickets/2",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "url": "tickets/3",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
  ]
}

post /events/{eventId}/tickets

Create tickets amount for event

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • eventId: required (string)

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket creation",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "price": {
      "description": "Ticket price",
      "type": "number"
    },
    "amount": {
      "description": "Amount of tickets for specified price",
      "type": "integer",
      "minimum": 1
    },
    "details": {      
      "description": "Any ticket details",
      "type": "string"  
    }
  },
  "required": ["price"]
}

HTTP status code 201

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "description": "Tickets list information",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "size": {
      "decription": "Size of current list",
      "type": "integer"  
    },
    "offset": {
      "description": "Offset, for pagination",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "sort": {
      "description": "Field name to sort",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["price", "eventName"]
    },
    "order": {
      "description": "Sort order",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["asc", "desc"]
    },
    "hits": {
      "decription": "Number of all hits",
      "type": "integer"
    }, 
    "items": {
      "descriptions": "Tickets list",
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {        
          "id": {
            "description": "Ticket id",
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "url": {
            "description": "Link to ticket",
            "type": "string"
          },
          "details": {
            "description": "Any ticket details",
            "type": "string"  
          },
          "eventName": {
            "description": "Event name",
            "type": "string"  
          },
          "price": {
            "description": "Ticket price",
            "type": "number"  
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "hits": 3,
  "items": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "url": "tickets/1",
      "details": "Sector A",
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "url": "tickets/2",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "url": "tickets/3",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
  ]
}

/tickets

/tickets/{ticketId} get patch delete

get

Retrieve ticket information

patch

Modify ticket status

delete

Delete specified ticket

get /tickets/{ticketId}

Retrieve ticket information

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ticketId: required (string)

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket description",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to ticket",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {
      "description": "ticket id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "owner": {
      "description": "Owner username",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventName": {
      "description": "Name of event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventUrl": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "details": {
      "description": "Any ticket details",
      "type": "string"  
    },
    "price": {
      "description": "Ticket price",
      "type": "number"
    },
    "status": {
      "description": "Ticket status",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["free", "pending", "sold"]
    }
  },
  "required": ["url", "id", "owner", "eventName", "eventUrl", "price", "status"]
}

Example:

{
  "url": "/tickets/2",
  "id": 2,
  "owner": "bob",
  "eventName": "Very interesting event",
  "eventUrl": "events/1",
  "price": 35.5,
  "status": "free"
}

patch /tickets/{ticketId}

Modify ticket status

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ticketId: required (string)

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket modification",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "id": {
      "description": "ticket id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "owner": {
      "description": "Owner username",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "status": {
      "description": "Ticket status",
      "type": "string" 
    }
  },
  "required": ["id"]
}

Example:

{
  "id": 2,
  "owner": "bob",
  "status": "sold"
}

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "title": "Ticket description",
  "type" : "Object",
  "properties": {
    "url": {
      "description": "Link to ticket",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "id": {
      "description": "ticket id",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "owner": {
      "description": "Owner username",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventName": {
      "description": "Name of event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "eventUrl": {
      "description": "Link to event",
      "type": "string"
    },
    "details": {
      "description": "Any ticket details",
      "type": "string"  
    },
    "price": {
      "description": "Ticket price",
      "type": "number"
    },
    "status": {
      "description": "Ticket status",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["free", "pending", "sold"]
    }
  },
  "required": ["url", "id", "owner", "eventName", "eventUrl", "price", "status"]
}

Example:

{
  "url": "/tickets/2",
  "id": 2,
  "owner": "bob",
  "eventName": "Very interesting event",
  "eventUrl": "events/1",
  "price": 35.5,
  "status": "free"
}

delete /tickets/{ticketId}

Delete specified ticket

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • ticketId: required (string)

HTTP status code 204

/users

/users/{userId}/tickets get

get

Retrieve all tickets for specified

get /users/{userId}/tickets

Retrieve all tickets for specified

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • userId: required (string)

Query Parameters

  • Sorting field: (one of price, eventName)

    Field to sort by

    Example:

    name
  • Sorting order: (one of asc, desc)

    Field to sort by

    Example:

    asc
  • Page size: (integer)

    Page size for pagination

    Example:

    10
  • Filter field: (string)

    Field to filter by connect. Used only with "value" parameter

    Example:

    eventName
  • Filter value: (string)

    Field to filter by connect. Used only with "value" parameter

    Example:

    Very interesting event

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "description": "Tickets list information",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "size": {
      "decription": "Size of current list",
      "type": "integer"  
    },
    "offset": {
      "description": "Offset, for pagination",
      "type": "integer"
    },
    "sort": {
      "description": "Field name to sort",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["price", "eventName"]
    },
    "order": {
      "description": "Sort order",
      "type": "string",
      "enum": ["asc", "desc"]
    },
    "hits": {
      "decription": "Number of all hits",
      "type": "integer"
    }, 
    "items": {
      "descriptions": "Tickets list",
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {        
          "id": {
            "description": "Ticket id",
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "url": {
            "description": "Link to ticket",
            "type": "string"
          },
          "details": {
            "description": "Any ticket details",
            "type": "string"  
          },
          "eventName": {
            "description": "Event name",
            "type": "string"  
          },
          "price": {
            "description": "Ticket price",
            "type": "number"  
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "hits": 3,
  "items": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "url": "tickets/1",
      "details": "Sector A",
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "url": "tickets/2",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "url": "tickets/3",
      "details": "Sector B",
    },
  ]
}
